name: Harpaesis (Tyler Haley)
description:
Harpaesis is a semi-isometric strategy game based on character synergy

You can download the .exe file here on my profile, or at https://goodking205.itch.io/harpaesis.

This project was created as a capstone project. The first semester was spent prototyping and the second was spent fleshing out and polishing it into a proper game. I spent most of my time on this project modeling, but I also created one of the enemy sprites, created both Cathedral levels, and created the textures to go with the stone walls I made; as well as created the starting point for the audio manager, and created and implemented a tilemap for the ground textures. I was very happy to work with my team and I don't think it could have gone any better given the team's skillset.
